desc: Hollywood Caricature Dog Toys, Celebrity Dog Toys, Celebuddies Dog Toys, Famous People Dog Toys, Funny Dog Toys

layout.text: Welcome to Celebuddies, a dog’s BFF* *Best Famous Friend!
OMG, they’re here! Aaaaaah!!!!! Let’s give it up for Celebuddies Dog Toys! Squishy, sturdy, fun-loving look-alikes of pop culture’s most popular peeps!
